mapper.select: SELECT so.org_code, so.org_short_name, so.pid, so.`status`, so.is_sale_org, so.org_name, so.type, so.parent_org_name, so.parent_org_code, so.create_by, so.create_time, so.lastmodified_by, so.lastmodified_time, so.org_order, so.org_level, so.org_view_code, so.manager_level, so.org_reg_code, so.legal_person, so.found_date, so.org_province, so.org_area, so.org_address, so.org_sys_type, so.is_rpt_summary, so.is_rpt_self, so.is_rpt_sub, so.is_cancel, so.change_status, so.v_id, so.v_start_date, so.v_end_date, so.v_no, so.v_name, so.memo, so.dir_staff_num, so.org_manager, so.country, so.province, so.city, so.abroad_city, so.credit_code, so.is_abroad, so.corp_attribute, so.org_fax, so.org_post_code FROM sys_org_ AS so
